testcase.name: Download and ingest a mixed corpus
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Download and ingest a mixed corpus When I download a mixed corpus into "corpus" ... passed in 2.235s Then the corpus contains at least 5 items ... passed in 0.002s And the corpus contains at least 1 item with media type "text/markdown" ... passed in 0.001s And the corpus contains at least 1 item with media type "text/html" ... passed in 0.001s And the corpus contains at least 1 item with media type "image/jpeg" ... passed in 0.001s And the corpus contains at least 1 item with media type "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document" ... passed in 0.001s And the corpus contains at least 2 items with media type "application/pdf" ... passed in 0.002s And the corpus contains at least 1 item tagged "scanned" ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
